original_text: He also made temples on high places and appointed priests from among all the people, who were not of the Levites.
korean_text: 그가 또 산당들을 짓고 레위 자손 아닌 보통 백성으로 제사장을 삼고

sentences.original_text: He also made temples on high places
and appointed priests from among all the people
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 모든 백성 중에서 제사장들을 임명했는데

sentences.original_text: who were not of the Levites.
